field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs)⩓exists(select 1 from #unit b where @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct having count(b.ma_dvcs) > 1)⩓not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and b.user_id = @user and b.r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_bp0
field.check: ma_bp0 not in (select ma_bp from bidmbp0)⩓not exists(select 1 from bisyspurorgrights b where @@table.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.user_id = @user and b.r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_nh0
field.check: ma_nh0 not in (select ma_nh from bidmnhom0 where @admin = 1 or not exists(select 1 from bisyspurgrouprights where user_id = @user) or ma_nh in (select ma_nh0 from bisyspurgrouprights where user_id = @user))

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from &VendorList;)

field.name: ma_tt
field.check: ma_tt <> '' and ma_tt not in (select ma_tt from dmtt)

field.name: ngay_hl_den
field.check: ngay_hl_tu > ngay_hl_den

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.name: so_luong
field.check: sl_dat_tt > 0 and so_luong < sl_dat_tt⩓sl_dat_td > 0 and so_luong > sl_dat_td

field.name: ngay_giao
field.check: ngay_giao is not null and ngay_ct > ngay_giao

field.name: ma_vung
field.check: ma_vung <> '' and ma_vung not in (select ma_vung from bidmvung where ma_dvcs = @@table.ma_dvcs and (@admin = 1 or not exists(select 1 from bisysplantrights where user_id = @user) or ma_vung in (select ma_vung from bisysplantrights where user_id = @user)) and (not exists(select 1 from bidmbp0g1 where ma_vung = bidmvung.ma_vung) or ma_vung in (select ma_vung from bidmbp0g1 where ma_bp0 = @@table.ma_bp0)))

field.name: ma_kho
field.check: ma_kho <> '' and (ma_kho not in (select ma_kho from dmkho where ma_dvcs = @@table.ma_dvcs and ma_vung = @@table.ma_vung and (not exists(select 1 from syssiterights where user_id = @user) or ma_kho in (select ma_kho from syssiterights where user_id = @user))))

field.name: ma_rb
field.check: ma_rb <> '' and ma_rb not in (select ma_rb from bidmrbmh)

field.name: ma_nt
field.check: ma_nt not in (select ma_nt from dmnt)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: ma_vv <> '' and ma_vv not in (select ma_vv from dmvv)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp <> '' and ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from dmbp)

field.name: so_lsx
field.check: so_lsx <> '' and so_lsx not in (select so_lsx from phlsx)

field.name: ma_sp
field.check: ma_sp <> '' and ma_sp not in (select ma_vt from vdmsp)

field.name: ma_hd
field.check: ma_hd <> '' and ma_hd not in (select ma_hd from dmhd)

field.name: ma_phi
field.check: ma_phi <> '' and ma_phi not in (select ma_phi from dmphi)

field.name: ma_ku
field.check: ma_ku <> '' and ma_ku not in (select ma_ku from dmku)

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @$checkPurOrg nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundPrice int, @roundAmount int, @roundFAmount int, @qtyRound int select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', ''), 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'bim&Detail;$', @detail = 'bid&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'bii&Detail;$', @general = 'bic&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chứng từ số %s1 ngày %s2 tại dòng %s3 đã tồn tại.' else 'The voucher number %s1 dated %s2 at row %s3 already exists.' end select @$checkPurOrg = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Thông tin nhà cung cấp %s1 và đơn vị mua %s2 tại dòng %s3 không hợp lệ.' else 'Vendor information %s1 and Purchasing Organization %s2 at row %s3 are invalid.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @roundFAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien_nt' select @qtyRound = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_round_sl' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join bic&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bic&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end else begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C002' from @@table a join bic&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bic&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end if @r is not null and @$mode <> 1 begin if @check$Unit <> '1' select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r else select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_kh', stt, 'C006' from @@table a where not exists (select 1 from bidmnccbp0 b where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0) and exists(select 1 from bidmnccbp0 c where a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh) &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a where not exists (select 1 from bidmnccbp0 b where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0) and exists(select 1 from bidmnccbp0 c where a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh) if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@$checkPurOrg, '%s1', ma_kh), '%s2', ma_bp0), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end -- Update update @@table set dvt = case when a.dvt <> '' then a.dvt else isnull(d.val, isnull(e.val, b.dvt)) end, ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, ma_tt = case when a.ma_tt <> '' then a.ma_tt else c.ma_tt end, so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)) from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join &VendorList; c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh left join bidmvttsvung d on a.ma_vt = d.ma_vt and a.ma_vung = d.ma_vung and d.name = 'dvt' left join bidmvtts e on a.ma_vt = e.ma_vt and e.name = 'dvt' select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; @@checking(1); if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; end &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking; &EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from bim&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_vt, dvt, cast(0 as bit) as nhieu_dvt, he_so, ma_vung, ma_kho, so_luong, gia_nt, gia, tien_nt, tien, so_ngay_giao, ngay_giao, so_theo_doi, ma_vt_ncc, tap_theo_doi, sl_dat_tt, sl_dat_td, ma_rb, ncc_tx, ghi_chu, tu_choi_yn, ma_vv, ma_sp, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_hd, ma_ku, ma_phi into #d&Detail; from bid&Detail;$000000 insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.ma_vung, a.ma_kho, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt, round(a.gia_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundPrice), a.tien_nt, round(a.tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.so_ngay_giao, a.ngay_giao, '', a.ma_vt_ncc, '', a.sl_dat_tt, a.sl_dat_td, a.ma_rb, a.ncc_tx, a.ghi_chu, a.tu_choi_yn, a.ma_vv, a.ma_sp, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_hd, a.ma_ku, a.ma_phi from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt update #d&Detail; set he_so = b.he_so from #d&Detail; a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 select top 0 stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, loai_ct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_nt, ty_gia, ma_kh, ma_tt, dien_giai, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, t_so_luong, t_tien_nt, t_tien into #m&Detail; from bim&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, a.ma_dvcs, a.ma_bp0, a.ma_nh0, '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, a.ma_kh, a.ma_tt, a.dien_giai, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, d.t_so_luong, d.t_tien_nt, d.t_tien from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct join ( select stt_rec, sum(so_luong) as t_so_luong, sum(tien_nt) as t_tien_nt, sum(tien) as t_tien from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec ) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, e$, f$, ngay_giao1, ngay_giao2, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from bii&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#20$' + rtrim(ma_nt) + '#25$' + rtrim(ma_bp0) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nh0), '', '', '', null, null from #m&Detail; declare @$s varchar(8000) select @$s = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry$Ex('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'ma_vt, ma_vung, so_theo_doi, tap_theo_doi, ma_vt_ncc', '#10$, #20$, #30$, #40$, #50$', 'stt_rec', default, default, @voucherID, 'e$,f$', 1) execute (@$s) update #i&Detail; set ngay_giao1 = b.ngay_giao1, ngay_giao2 = b.ngay_giao2 from #i&Detail; a join (select min(ngay_giao) as ngay_giao1, max(ngay_giao) as ngay_giao2, stt_rec from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec declare @p varchar(32), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting; -- delete bigia01 where stt_rec in (select stt_rec from #m93) delete bigia02 where stt_rec in (select stt_rec from #m93) delete bigia0dc where stt_rec in (select stt_rec from #m93) if @status = 1 begin insert into bigia01 (stt_rec, stt_rec0, stt_rec1, ma_ct, loai_ct, ngay_lct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_nt, dien_giai, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, ma_vung, ma_kh, ma_vt, dvt1, he_so1, so_luong1, gia_chuan_nt1, gia_nt1, ck_dv_nt1, cp_dv_nt1, so_luong, gia_chuan_nt, gia_nt, ck_nt, cp_nt, ck_dv_nt, cp_dv_nt, ct_gia_dk, ghi_chu, line_nbr, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, '', @voucherID, b.loai_ct, b.ngay_ct, b.ngay_ct, b.so_ct, b.ma_nt, b.dien_giai, b.ma_dvcs, b.ma_bp0, b.ma_nh0, a.ma_vung, b.ma_kh, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, a.he_so, 0, 0, a.gia_nt, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, '', a.ghi_chu, a.line_nbr, 1, @datetime0, @datetime0, rtrim(@user), rtrim(@user) from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec insert into bigia02 (stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_ct, loai_ct, ngay_lct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_nt, dien_giai, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, ma_vung, ma_kh, ma_vt, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, ma_rb, so_ngay_giao, sl_dat_tt, sl_dat_td, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, @voucherID, b.loai_ct, b.ngay_ct, b.ngay_ct, b.so_ct, b.ma_nt, b.dien_giai, b.ma_dvcs, b.ma_bp0, b.ma_nh0, a.ma_vung, b.ma_kh, a.ma_vt, b.ngay_hl_tu, b.ngay_hl_den, a.ma_rb, a.so_ngay_giao, round(sl_dat_tt * a.he_so, @qtyRound), round(sl_dat_td * a.he_so, @qtyRound), 1, @datetime0, @datetime0, rtrim(@user), rtrim(@user) from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec insert into bigia0dc (stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_ct, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_nt, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, ma_vung, ma_kh, ma_vt, dvt, he_so, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, so_luong, gia_chuan_nt, gia_nt, tien_nt, so_ngay_giao, sl_dat_tt, sl_dat_td, ma_vt_ncc, ma_rb, ncc_tx, dien_giai, ct_gia_pv, ct_gia_dk, line_nbr, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select a.stt_rec, a.stt_rec0, @voucherID, a.ngay_ct, b.so_ct, b.ma_nt, b.ma_dvcs, b.ma_bp0, b.ma_nh0, a.ma_vung, b.ma_kh, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, a.he_so, b.ngay_hl_tu, b.ngay_hl_den, a.so_luong, 0, a.gia_nt, a.tien_nt, a.so_ngay_giao, a.sl_dat_tt, a.sl_dat_td, a.ma_vt_ncc, a.ma_rb, a.ncc_tx, a.ghi_chu, '', '', a.line_nbr, 1, @datetime0, @datetime0, rtrim(@user), rtrim(@user) from #d&Detail; a join #m&Detail; b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec end
